name: Sketch Photo Editor
description:
Convert your photos into a best artistic sketch using this application sketch photo maker.
This application is very easy to use and totally free on store, just download this application and make your photos like artistic paintings.

There is many sketch styles available in this app you can use anyone from them easily.

■ Different Sketch styles in the App.

1: Pencil Effect.
2: Color Pencil Effect.
3: Water painting.
4: Oil painting.
5: Cartoon Style Effect.
